title: Was ‘America’s Frontline Doctor’ Simone Gold at US Capitol Attack?
subtitle: Readers may remember Gold from the notorious "White Coat Summit" of 2020.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Simone Gold, who gained notoriety for promoting without evidence that hydroxychloroquine is a cure for COVID-19, was in the U.S. Capitol during the Jan. 6, 2021, riot.
